title: Windows Of Grace
itunes:title: Windows Of Grace
description:
There are some seasons when God offers us a special moment of favor. If you'll step into this window of grace, doors will open that you couldn't open. God wants to use this opportunity to take you to a new level.Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love. To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
